## DefaultControlGroupComponentOptions interface

Represents component options for a default control group component configured with [DynamicFormDefaultOptions](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformdefaultoptions.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DefaultControlGroupComponentOptions 
```

## Remarks

Use declaration merging to populate interface with options.
